facultyName: College of Medical and Dental Sciences
description: Our MSc Bioimaging (formerly MSc Quantitative Bioimaging) combines the most exciting developments in advanced microscopy and quantitative image analysis for the study of key biomedical questions. Upon completion, students will be an ideal position to pursue a successful career in academia, as well as in the microscopy or pharmaceutical
fees: FeesAnnual tuition fee for 2021/22: UK: £13,500 full-time International: £25,380 full-time
